text:
Andy, who assisted me with check-in today, is an exemplary representative of Sats and I'm so grateful for his help. He made the whole experience at Singapore's Changi airport fantastic. Thank you Andy!
Qatar flight to Dubai
T1
10.15
11th March 2025

The worst airport service. We flew business class and even after the entire plane disembarked, we were still left waiting for our stroller. Almost any country we flew to, took less time than SATS Airport Service. A shame to Singapore!

Really helpful information counter.(infront of LV outlet T1)
We lost the passport on board,after we informed them the details,they trying their best to assist us and arrange earlest flight back to our hometown.special thanks to Sats staffs Mr.Remi and his colleagues Ms.Hwang and Ms.Chanise.

This is definitely not a “Pride of Singapore” when nobody answers the hotline for days. How can we pride ourselves with service excellence when there is no one to get through to, and worst of all, information counter is calling their service staff in the terminal yet nobody is answering. And since it’s a glass door, I can clearly see there are sats staff at the counter BUT NOT PICKING UP THE PHONE.
Better never get stuck in delayed luggage delivery. Agents are lying the moment they are talking.
